reference.shortdesc: A schemeref element references another subject scheme map. Typically, the referenced subject scheme defines a base set of controlled values; the referencing map then extends the base set of controlled values. The values specified in the subject scheme maps are merged; the result is equivalent to specifying all of the values in a single map.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The schemeref element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the subject scheme module.

div.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , , keys, and keyref.

For this element:
The format attribute has a default value of ditamap.
The type attribute has a default value of scheme.
